blocks.subject: FW: Kern P/G
text: I will prepare Unanimous Consent electing Robert Jones.  What do we want to
use as effective date?  Please advise.  Thanks, Deb

blocks.subject: Re: Signatory Authority for Net Works and EnronOnline
raw_header: Subject: Re: Signatory Authority for Net Works and EnronOnline
text: Robert Jones appears to be a VP of Enron Net Works, but not EnronOnline.
By copy of this email to Deb Korkmas, I would like to confirm that the above
is correct, and if it is, can we please get Robert Jones added as a VP of

blocks.subject: Signatory Authority for Net Works and EnronOnline
raw_header: Subject: Signatory Authority for Net Works and EnronOnline
text: Does Robert Jones, HR VP, have signatory authority for Net Works and
EnronOnline?   Per Michelle Cash, he needs it since he signs employment
contracts, ect.  If he does not, we'll need to have some retroactive
